授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to be able to write complete essays of varying degrees of complexity with outside sources integrated in accordance with proper academic citation standards.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. plan and organize a highly sophisticated academic essay.
2. conduct and write a written report on an interview.
3. research information on a topic in the library and on the internet.
4. use outside information to support a written argument.
5. format a 2000-3000 word research essay using MLA or APA citation style.
授業方法: All classes will be held on-campus, in a classroom and face-to-face.

トピック.授業計画1: Students will be required to follow instructions from the instructor, use the textbook and supplementary materials, discuss their ideas with their classmates and complete assignments and exams to complete this course.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to complete approximately 60 minutes of work outside of class each week.

教科書/Required texts1: Effective Academic Writing 3: The Researched Essay Second Edition

成績評価Grading1: Mid-term Exam 20 , Final Exam 20, Weekly Writing Journal 20, homework, quizzes and writing assignments 40.
